Tool

NameExport Raster
ID1
AuthorO.Conrad (c) 2007
Specificationgrid

Description

The "GDAL Raster Export" module exports one or more grids to various file formats using the "Geospatial Data Abstraction Library" (GDAL) by Frank Warmerdam. For more information have a look at the GDAL homepage: http://www.gdal.org GDAL Version:2.2.3 Following raster formats are currently supported:

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
Grid(s) Grid list (input)GRIDS
Options
FileFile pathFILEThe GDAL dataset to be created.
FormatChoiceFORMATThe GDAL raster format (driver) to be used.Available Choices: [0] Virtual Raster [1] GeoTIFF [2] National Imagery Transmission Format [3] Erdas Imagine Images (.img) [4] ELAS [5] In Memory Raster [6] MS Windows Device Independent Bitmap [7] PCIDSK Database File [8] PCRaster Raster File [9] ILWIS Raster Map [10] SGI Image File Format 1.0 [11] Leveller heightfield [12] Terragen heightfield [13] Network Common Data Format [14] HDF4 Dataset [15] USGS Astrogeology ISIS cube (Version 3) [16] USGS Astrogeology ISIS cube (Version 2) [17] ERMapper .ers Labelled [18] Raster Matrix Format [19] Idrisi Raster A.1 [20] Intergraph Raster [21] Golden Software Binary Grid (.grd) [22] Golden Software 7 Binary Grid (.grd) [23] Geospatial PDF [24] MBTiles [25] Meta Raster Format [26] Portable Pixmap Format (netpbm) [27] PCI .aux Labelled [28] Vexcel MFF Raster [29] Vexcel MFF2 (HKV) Raster [30] VTP .bt (Binary Terrain) 1.3 Format [31] Erdas .LAN/.GIS [32] Image Data and Analysis [33] NOAA Vertical Datum .GTX [34] NTv2 Datum Grid Shift [35] CTable2 Datum Grid Shift [36] KOLOR Raw [37] ROI_PAC raster [38] ENVI .hdr Labelled [39] ESRI .hdr Labelled [40] ISCE raster [41] Northwood Numeric Grid Format .grd/.tab [42] ARC Digitized Raster Graphics [43] SAGA GIS Binary Grid (.sdat) [44] GeoPackage Default: 0
Data TypeChoiceTYPEThe GDAL datatype of the created dataset.Available Choices: [0] match input data [1] 8 bit unsigned integer [2] 16 bit unsigned integer [3] 16 bit signed integer [4] 32 bit unsigned integer [5] 32 bit signed integer [6] 32 bit floating point [7] 64 bit floating point Default: 0
Set Custom NoDataBooleanSET_NODATADefault: 0
NoData ValueFloating pointNODATADefault: 3.000000
Creation OptionsTextOPTIONSA space separated list of key-value pairs (K=V).
